column1: Stars that have dubious parallaxes, new distances beyond 10 pc (within 2 sigma) or questioned companionship

UPM 1945+2836         ;        ;          ;Vul  ;19 45 24.3 +28 36 56 ;      ;       ; 141     ; 11    ;             ; 14.73 V   ;   ;GDR2 pi < 1 mas, wrong colors: from B-V it's a F6 star, from V-Ks it's a M9.5 one, neither is compatible with the expected color of an early to mid M dwarf
